title: UMass Amherst Issues Reminder of Emergency Campus Safety Programs (University of Massachusetts Amherst)
text: ( Source : University of Massachusetts Amherst ) The University of Massachusetts Amherst reminds students, staff and faculty, along with family members of students, that the campus has a series of interlocking programs and law enforcement
